title: Emerald & Diamond Navratna Neckpiece - A Timeless Classic
materials: E-F Color) and Heart-Shaped Emeralds. This piece is adorned with our signature Hyderabadi Polish
ensuring a lasting luster and radiant glow.
features: This exquisite necklace features delicate floral and paisley motifs, meticulously studded with diamonds. The pendant elements consist of 10 heart-shaped emeralds throughout the choker. The design is a modern take on traditional South Indian patterns, combining contemporary elegance with timeless appeal.
colors: The necklace showcases a rich gold hue complemented by the dazzling brilliance of white diamonds and the vibrant green of the emeralds
creating a harmonious and eye-catching color palette.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings
or any event where you want to make a statement. Its versatile design also makes it suitable for modern parties and formal gatherings.
description: This neckpiece is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian artistry with modern design sensibilities. The combination of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds creates a mesmerizing effect, making it a truly unique and valuable addition to your jewelry collection. Invest in a piece that exudes elegance and sophistication, a true reflection of your impeccable taste.
